text: On the Red Front () is a 1920 Russian silent movie directed by Lev Kuleshov.Биография Льва КулешоваНа красном фронте It stars Aleksandra Khokhlova, Lev Kuleshov, and Leonid Obolensky. ==Actors== * Aleksandra Khokhlova as Polish peasant * Lev Kuleshov as Polish Peasant * Leonid Obolensky as Red Army soldier * A. Reikh as Polish spy == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:1920 movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Kuleshov
title: On the Red Front
